name: haproxy
description: HAProxy is a high-performance TCP/HTTP load balancer and reverse proxy server designed for high availability and scalability. Commonly used in production to expose microservices and secure backend connections.
features: Load Balancing: Distribute traffic, Multiple algorithms, Health checks. Scale effortlessly.
High Availability: Failover support, Zero downtime, Redundancy. Always online.
SSL/TLS: Certificate management, SNI support, Encryption. Secure connections.
Performance: Extremely fast, Low latency, High throughput. Handle millions of requests.
Monitoring: Real-time stats, Detailed metrics, Web dashboard. Full visibility.
ACLs: Flexible routing rules, Content switching, Request filtering. Precise control.
Compression: Gzip support, Bandwidth savings, Faster delivery. Optimize traffic.
Sticky Sessions: Session persistence, Cookie-based, IP-based. Maintain state.
Rate Limiting: DDoS protection, Request throttling, Abuse prevention. Stay protected.
Production Ready: Battle-tested, Enterprise-grade, Trusted worldwide. Deploy with confidence.
